response.original_title: คอนเสิร์ตแบบเบิร์ดเบิร์ดโชว์ ครั้งที่ 7 ตอน อโรคา จอมยากับยาใจ (นิโคล เทริโอ)
response.overview: Aroka Jom-Ya-Kub-Ya-Jai is the name of the episode of the 7th Bird Bird Show concert, held from 15 - 30 April 2000, performed at the main auditorium, Thailand Cultural Center, Huai Khwang District, Bangkok, for 20 shows. Number of spectators: 40,000, a bird's-eye concert. The first and only time that there will be a musical throughout the concert, with Nat Myria, Nicole Therio playing the lead roles and taking turns performing each round.
response.title: Babb Bird Bird Show #7/2000 Aroka Jom-Ya-Kub-Ya-Jai (Nicole Theriault)

cast.name: Thongchai McIntyre
cast.original_name: ธงไชย แมคอินไตย์
